resource.pluginArgs: --extDbName %RESOURCE_NAME% --extDbRlsVer %RESOURCE_VERSION% --seqExtDbName "Tbrucei427_chromosomes_RSRC" --seqExtDbRlsVer @@Tbrucei427_chromosomes_VER@@ --mapFile @@gusHome@@/lib/xml/isf/TriTrypDB/Tbrucei427Embl2gus.xml --inputFileOrDir @@dataDir@@/embl --inputFileExtension "embl" --fileFormat embl --soCvsVersion @@SO_VER@@ --defaultOrganism "Trypanosoma brucei brucei strain 427" --seqSoTerm "chromosome" --validationLog @@dataDir@@/validation.log --bioperlTreeOutput @@dataDir@@/bioperlTree.out --seqIdColumn source_id --naSequenceSubclass ExternalNASequence

--ECMappingFile @@dataDir@@/ec.txt --evidenceCode "GeneDB" --aaSeqLocusTagMappingSql "SELECT aa_sequence_id FROM dots.GeneFeature g, dots.Transcript t, dots.TranslatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.source_id = ? AND g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id"

--ECMappingFile @@dataDir@@/ec.txt --evidenceCode "GeneDB" --aaSeqLocusTagMappingSql "SELECT aa_sequence_id FROM dots.GeneFeature g, dots.Transcript t, dots.TranslatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.source_id = ? AND g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id"

--ECMappingFile @@dataDir@@/ec.txt --evidenceCode "GeneDB" --aaSeqLocusTagMappingSql "SELECT aa_sequence_id FROM dots.GeneFeature g, dots.Transcript t, dots.TranslatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.source_id = ? AND g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id"

--externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --inputFile @@dataDir@@/Tbruceibrucei927.gas --goExternalDatabaseSpec "GO_RSRC|@@GO_VER@@" --seqIdSql "SELECT g.source_id, taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.genefeature g, dots.transcript t, dots.translatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id UNION SELECT taf.source_id, taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.translatedAAFeature taf" --targetTable "DoTS::TranslatedAASequence" --lineOfEvidence "GeneDB" --inputIdColumn id --tolerateMissingSeqs --skipBadGOTerms @@dataDir@@/badGOTerms.log

--externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --inputFile @@dataDir@@/Tbruceigambiense.gas --goExternalDatabaseSpec "GO_RSRC|@@GO_VER@@" --seqIdSql "SELECT g.source_id, taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.genefeature g, dots.transcript t, dots.translatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id UNION SELECT taf.source_id, taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.translatedAAFeature taf" --targetTable "DoTS::TranslatedAASequence" --lineOfEvidence "GeneDB" --inputIdColumn id --tolerateMissingSeqs --skipBadGOTerms @@dataDir@@/badGOTerms.log

--externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --inputFile @@dataDir@@/Tbruceibrucei427.gas --goExternalDatabaseSpec "GO_RSRC|@@GO_VER@@" --seqIdSql "SELECT g.source_id, taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.genefeature g, dots.transcript t, dots.translatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id UNION SELECT taf.source_id, taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.translatedAAFeature taf" --targetTable "DoTS::TranslatedAASequence" --lineOfEvidence "GeneDB" --inputIdColumn id --tolerateMissingSeqs --skipBadGOTerms @@dataDir@@/badGOTerms.log

resource.unpack: executeIdSQL.pl --idSQL "update apidb.NEXTGENSEQ_ALIGN set intron_size = regexp_replace(regexp_substr(query_id,'\(\d+\)','1'),'[\(|\)]','') where intron_size is null and sample in ('curated_polyA','curated_splice')"
executeIdSQL.pl --idSQL "update apidb.NEXTGENSEQ_ALIGN set strand = decode(strand,'+','-','-','+') where sample = 'curated_polyA'"

resource.pluginArgs: --contact @@TriTrypSageTags.Contact@@ --arrayDesignName 'SageTagArrayDesign_RSRC' --arrayDesignVersion '2' --studyName 'Transcriptome analysis of two life stages of Trypanosoma brucei gambiense' --studyDescription '' --freqFile @@dataDir@@/freqs.tsv
